name: Timber Tennis
detailed_description:
Meet Timber Tennis, a completely new addition to the Timberman family - a series of games enjoyed by more than 30 000 000 people around the world!

Take part in the annual Timber Tennis world championships - beat all the rivals (including Princess, Hipster, Boxer and many more), upgrade your skills, use super shots, and watch out for specials! Unlock all the characters, win trophies, and compete in local or online multiplayer mode with your friends!

Features:
  • easy to learn, hard to master
  • local and online multiplayer
  • recognizable characters (including Timberman and his good friends)
  • tons of fresh content to unlock (courts, balls, characters)
  • tasty pixel art graphics
  • awesome 8-bit soundtrack by Stalek (Timberman music composer)

short_description: A new addition to the Timberman family - a series of games enjoyed by more than 30 million players! Take part in the annual Timber Tennis world championships - beat the single player campaign and challenge your friends in the local or online multiplayer mode!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Processor: 1.4Ghz or Higher
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 compatible video card with 256 MB shared or dedicated RAM (ATI or NVIDIA)
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.6 Snow Leopard or later
  • Processor: Intel Mac
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 compatible video card with 256 MB shared or dedicated RAM (ATI or NVIDIA)

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04 32-bit or Ubuntu 12.10 32-bit
  • Processor: 1.4Ghz or Higher
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 compatible video card with 256 MB shared or dedicated RAM (ATI or NVIDIA)
